## The Chocolate Stall

::::

::: {.column-body .scenario-image}

![](images/wizzle.png)

:::

:::: {.column-body .scenario-text}

Cara approached the chocolate stall, where a kind old wizard named Wizzle was selling enchanted chocolates.

Wizzle pointed to a box of Giggle Gumdrops. "These giggly treats will make you laugh and dance! Would you like to try some?"

Wizzle then showed her a jar of Sparkle Sweets. "These sweets will make you sparkle and shine like a star! Would you like a taste?"

Lastly, Wizzle unveiled a plate of Frosty Fudge. "This fudge will give you the power to create snowflakes with a wave of your hand! Do you want to try it?"
